name: places/ChIJKQVUx65ZwokRRcJEqd1Hmhs
formattedAddress: 430 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 430 W 46th St, New York, NY 10036, USA

originalText.text: I went here and did a facial with Marcella- I booked a deep cleaning but when I went in Marcella assessed my face and gave a recommendation of what type of facial I needed. She was very nice and thorough. She cleaned my face really well. I came out of there glowing but not red and I felt like my pores were all cleaned out. I do have to say this place is just for a quick facial as it was only 1 hour. There are other places that give you the spa-like experience, with massages and etc, but this one was good and quick if you just want a straight up pore cleaning and nothing else.

originalText.text: My first custom facial with Marcella was amazing, she really took the time out to care for every part of the process. My second facial was the exfoliating one with Mona, the extraction part was extremely rough and we agreed not to touch a section of my face but it was still touched and I now fear I may have scarring due to the reaction on my face within that section.

originalText.text: I did a customised facial and a deep cleaning facial with Marcella and definitely felt amazing coming out of those two sessions. Marcella pays good attention to  my skin and prescribes suitable treatments. The facials are so relaxing that I would doze off. My skin feels extra smooth and refreshed. l highly recommend this place!

originalText.text: I had my first facial here today with Marcella after seeing all the positive Google reviews, and they definitely are not hype!  She was professional, knowledgeable, and time-efficient (which is super important to me with two young kids I need to tend to when I get back).  The spa is cozy and clean, I appreciated the calming background music.  I actually fell asleep (after extractions of course), that's how wonderful Marcella is!  This is definitely a no-frills facial experience.  I have had more luxurious facials with massages, etc. but I have to admit I much preferred the efficiency and price of the treatment I received today.  Marcella also had great recommendations on how to add to my current routine without drastically altering anything I've already been doing for years.  I am looking forward to booking my next one in November!

originalText.text: I come there for the last year. Today I had Marcella. I could not have started my Sunday better. She checked my skin and recommended the best treatment. She explained what she was doing and why and told me my after care. What more can you ask for? Will be back soon.
